sourcesContent:
Facturas de Venta

Numero Cliente Creacion Vencimiento Total Cobrado Por Cobrar Estado DIAN Estado Acciones
{{ row.numero }} {{ row.cliente }} {{ row.creacion }} {{ row.vencimiento }} {{ row.total }} {{ row.cobrado }} {{ row.porCobrar }} {{ row.estadoDian }} {{ row.estado }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; interface FacturaVenta { numero: string; cliente: string; creacion: string; vencimiento: string; total: number; cobrado: number; porCobrar: number; estadoDian: string; estado: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-factura-venta', templateUrl: './factura-venta.component.html', styleUrls: ['./factura-venta.component.css'] }) export class FacturaVentaComponent { // ... (previous imports and component decorator) export class FacturaVentaNuevoComponent { items: Item[] = []; total: number = 0; constructor() { this.addRow(); // Create the three items and add them to the items array this.items.push({ itemName: 'Activacion NIT', reference: 'Reference 1', price: 100, tax: 10, discount: 0, charge: 0, }); this.items.push({ itemName: 'Volumen Documento Electronico', reference: 'Reference 2', price: 200, tax: 10, discount: 0, charge: 0, }); this.items.push({ itemName: 'TEPRE', reference: 'Reference 3', price: 300, tax: 10, discount: 0, charge: 0, }); // Calculate the initial total this.calculateTotal(); } addRow(): void { // Add a new row with default values this.items.push({ itemName: '', // Set the default value to an empty string reference: '', price: 0, tax: 0, discount: 0, charge: 0, }); // Recalculate the total this.calculateTotal(); } deleteRow(index: number): void { // Delete the row at the specified index this.items.splice(index, 1); // Recalculate the total this.calculateTotal(); } // Calculate the total value from price and tax of all rows calculateTotal(): void { this.total = this.items.reduce((sum, row) => { const price = row.price || 0; const tax = row.tax || 0; return sum + price + (price * tax) / 100; }, 0); } // Handle the event when the "Item" dropdown selection changes onItemChange(rowIndex: number): void { // Logic to set the values for "Referencia" and "Precio Unitario" based on the selected item const selectedItem = this.items[rowIndex].itemName; // Find the corresponding item in the items array const matchedItem = this.items.find((item) => item.itemName === selectedItem); if (matchedItem) { // Update the row values with the matched item values this.items[rowIndex].reference = matchedItem.reference; this.items[rowIndex].price = matchedItem.price; this.items[rowIndex].tax = matchedItem.tax; this.items[rowIndex].discount = matchedItem.discount; this.items[rowIndex].charge = matchedItem.charge; } // Recalculate the total after updating the values this.calculateTotal(); } }
